post.title: You best start believin' in ghost stories

body:
(2017)

> What- you don't think Drumpf colluded with the Russians to steal the election? It's obvious to see- you really think the NYT, MSNBC and all these people I generally agree with would be making shit up? Lol if you can't see this was obviously a rigged election you must be getting paid in rubles or a complete retard. Educate yourself!

(2021)

> Here we go- you actually think the election was rigged? Maybe, just maybe all the postal votes came in for Biden because PEOPLE STAYED THE FUCK AT HOME like they're supposed to and THERE'S A PANDEMIC ON!1!1 You really think all the courts would reject election fraud claims because they were in on the conspiracy? You really think Drumpf got more votes then Biden? Lol- dude I don't know a single person in my group of friends who voted for that orange fascist piece of shit. Just accept it- he was a terrible president and maybe if you stopped watching Fox News and listened to people like Dr Fauci and the same people smart people like me listen to you'd see what a DISASTER his 4 years in office were. He got voted out- there's no conspiracy there- it's called democracy! But go on and keep imagining the election was rigged and drinking the Kool-Aid, buddy *smuckle*

He got voted out- there's no conspiracy there- it's called democracy! But go on and keep imagining the election was rigged and drinking the Kool-Aid, buddy smuckle

body:
There are always people who know about the evidence, they're the people who believe there's a conspiracy.

The disbeliever is asserting that nobody knows about the evidence to someone who knows about the evidence and is trying to tell you about it.
